name: Roman Temple of Light
description:
Game Mechanic

Player can pick up, put down and rotate cube to direct light to activate sphere. There are two kinds of cube, one that can redirect light and couldn’t.  

 Game Doucmentation

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cpPm0-BEErv3OZ-yUCszn5C0olHnee_h/edit

Game Engine and asset

Unreal engine 5

Asset from Unreal Engine Mega Scan Asset

The game plays with a mouse and keyboard.

  • Move: WASD
  • Jump: Space
  • Left Click: Pick up or drop objects
  • Q /E : Rotate held objects to reflect laser
